I bought an electric scooty eight months ago and I am extremely dissatisfied. Not only is the battery malfunctioning, but the tire has also developed a dangerous bubble. I strongly discourage anyone from purchasing this product due to its unacceptable quality and lack of support. I will clime the battery warranty before two months but I'm still not received the battery. Please don't buying hero electric scooters.

The Hero Electric Flash was a great buy and a good option for students. The power is less than some other electric bikes, but it is a great choice for daily use and short-distance rides, especially in its price range. The maintenance and servicing of the bike is also quite simple, so even beginners can handle it easily. It is not the best option for long-distance rides, but it is great for short trips of up to 15 km.

After driving the Hero Electric Flash, I found the appearance looks good but the performance was very poor. The quality of the vehicle was not good, with the shock absorber failing after only two months. I found that it was very difficult to find a local shop to do puncture work or to dismantle and assemble the wheel. Connectors for the motor were also not easily accessible. After running it for only 5000 km, I found that the battery cost was much higher than that of a petrol vehicle. This purchase only brought me unhappiness and a lot of disadvantages. The service center was also very poor and no one seemed to care.

I bought the Hero Electric Flash in June 2019 for around 41,000. The bike looks great and the plastic body gives it a modern look. However, I would not recommend it to carry more than 130-150kg of weight as the speed can be affected. I have had a small accident while riding the bike and the plastic body was not able to handle the impact. The bike takes around 8-9 hours to charge and can last up to 30-45 km. When I first bought it, there was no footrest for keeping my legs but the company may have added that feature since then. The maintenance of the bike is not that difficult as all you need to do is charge it and keep it clean. I would recommend to take it in for servicing every 2-3 months as it might cause some break issues. Other than that, the Hero Electric Flash is an amazing ride and you will be feeling happy driving it.

The Hero Electric Flash is a revolutionary electric vehicle that provides a smooth, silent and efficient ride. Its stand-by mode at the signal was a truly unique experience that highlighted its convenience and efficiency. Its immediate pick-up was a testament to its performance.Ads for the Flash can emphasize its practicality, as well as its eco-consciousness. It is a great vehicle for those looking for an in-town ride that does not waste power or money and is more eco-friendly. The Flash offers a great range per charge and is always looking for innovative ideas to improve battery life. With the Flash, you can be sure that your journey will be efficient, eco-friendly and enjoyable.

The Hero Electric Photon is a great electric scooter that offers impressive performance. It's capable of reaching high speeds, and has plenty of torque for tackling city streets or highways. However, comfort is not the best when riding this scooter. The back seat lacks support, and the height might not be suitable for everyone. In addition, the side stand does not automatically go up when you're riding, which can cause the scooter to hit bumps and speed bumps.¬†Overall, the Hero Electric Photon is an excellent electric scooter with great performance, but it could be improved in terms of comfort and convenience.

It is expected that only short rides in the suburbs and occasionally around the city can be taken with a car with a maximum range of 65 to 80 km. This is mainly due to the relatively long charging time of 6 to 8 hours and the absence of a fast charge option for the bike and the infrastructure required for it. Owners must make their own arrangements for electrical outlets. This is fine if you are on a familiar route, but it creates a lot of uncertainty when in an unfamiliar location.

Despite the limited power output, the main problem is that there is a lot of scope for improvement in the throttle tuning. Driving a scooter in city traffic is tough because even small amounts of throttle and carefully calculated openings lead to the scooter lurching forward sharply at low speeds. Within six months of purchase, I had to replace the battery of my hero bike twice. This is unacceptable and I feel the company should take measures to ensure the battery lasts at least one to two years or 10,000 km, or 500 charging cycles. Furthermore, the plastic body of the bike does not offer enough strength for the price. To top it off, the company does not respond to phone calls or emails. This indicates that Hero is an extremely mismanaged organization.

The quality of the material used in the scooter is very poor, and within a couple of months the joint of the seat breaks. Even the material used for children's toys is of higher quality. When you use the brakes, there is no shock absorption. The quality is extremely bad. In addition, there is no indication of the battery level. You should not even consider purchasing this scooter.

I recently purchased an NYX E-5 and as happy to be able to save both the environment and money. However, after a few days, I have encountered several issues. Firstly, the seat lock was not working and I was unable to charge the battery because the charger was locked in the seat. I managed to open the seat and charge the battery. Upon visiting the workshop, the mechanic found some wires had burnt near the connector and he replaced it.The same issue occurred a few days later and a mechanic from the workshop was reluctant to come, but eventually agreed after I requested, and charged me Rs. 200 for the visit. When I arrived at the workshop, the engineer identified that the wire near the connector had burnt again and replaced it. Additionally, the charger socket was not functioning, which he changed. The entire visit took me 3 hours and I was very frustrated.Thankfully, when I went to the workshop on another occasion, two engineers from Hero Electric were already present and they assisted me in resolving the issue.
